post.text: When they go low...we vote: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Gordon
comment.text: Vote yourself a pay raise, vote Trump. Trump will lower your taxes and health insurance premiums resulting in a bigger take home pay. Hillary says the middle class doesn't need a tax cut and she will continue Obamacare and make it even worse costing you even more money. Vote yourself a pay raise x vote Trump
